plugin.name: Aardwolf_Hunt_Trick
plugin.author: WinkleWinkle
plugin.purpose: Hunt trick mobs for cps and gqs.

alias.name: HuntTrick2
alias.send:
local index = 1
if ("%1" ~= "") then index = %1 end
EnableTriggerGroup("HuntTrick", true) SetVariable("HuntTrickIndex", index) SetVariable("HuntTrickMob", "%2") Queue("hunt " .. index .. ".%2")

alias.name: HuntTrickAbort
alias.send: ColourNote("darkorange", "", "Aborting Hunt Trick...") EnableTriggerGroup("HuntTrick", false) SetVariable("HuntTrickIndex", 1) SetVariable("HuntTrickMob", "")

trigger.match: ^You have no idea what you\'re doing\, but maybe (.+) left (?:up|down|west|east|north|south)\?|You are certain that (.+) is (?:up|down|west|east|north|south)\ from here\.|You couldn\'t find a path to .+ from here\.$
trigger.send: if (@HuntTrickMob ~= "") then SetVariable("HuntTrickIndex", @HuntTrickIndex + 1) if (@HuntTrickIndex < 5) then Execute("hunt " .. @HuntTrickIndex + 1 .. "." .. "@HuntTrickMob") else Queue("hunt " .. @HuntTrickIndex + 1 .. "." .. "@HuntTrickMob") end end

trigger.match: ^You seem unable to hunt that target for some reason\.$
trigger.send: if (@HuntTrickMob ~= "") then Execute("where @HuntTrickIndex.@HuntTrickMob") SetVariable("HuntTrickMob", "") end EnableTriggerGroup("HuntTrick", false) SetVariable("HuntTrickIndex", 1) SetVariable("HuntTrickMob", "")

trigger.match: ^No one in this area by that name\.$
